extendedInfo.description: It can be used to calculate days,weeks,business days from one day to another.For example it can be used to calculate pregnancy due date.Also you can record a count down list.v1.12:Support week & business day interval in addition or subtraction.

reviews.comment: Very useful. Should add week and month interval to date calculator and it would be perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very handy for doing interval calculations and binary searches between dates. Very responsive developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect for calculating global (ie 90 day) period for medical billing. Has a few ways of doing it. Nice easy to use interface for selecting dates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect for trial lawyer. Have to set trials w/i certain time frames
reviews.author: A Google User
